en.codex: This heavy duty Archwing was designed for one purpose, destruction.
en.description: The Elytron is an offensive-type Archwing specializing in area bombardment, capable of dealing massive amounts of damage against multiple enemies with its selection of missiles, and boasting high durability among Archwings.

ru.description: Этот тяжёлый Арчвинг был сконструирован с одним лишь предназначением - уничтожение.
